website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas AlphaBounce AMS is a running shoe that’s versatile enough to be an everyday companion, whether one is going to the gym, going for a short run, hiking or going to work. This averagely priced shoe can also be a unique fashion statement with its futuristic design, monochromatic upper pattern and muted, yet stylish colorways.
pros: Several testers were impressed at how comfortable the Adidas AlphaBounce AMS is
The modern look of the shoes was admired by those who love wearing running shoes that can also be worn casually
A number of users observed that the materials used for the shoe are of high quality
The pull tab and the slight extension of the heel cup were helpful features for a lot of users because it helped them put their feet into the shoe
Testers were impressed with the general durability of the shoe
The Bounce technology was lauded by testers who wanted more of a firmer feel and a springier rebound when running
The inner cushioning is not too plush
According to testers, it provided the right amount of foot stabilization and support
Despite the limited color choices, users still applauded the available colorways
The shape of the AlphaBounce AMS looks narrow and pointy, but many users observed that there is actually more room in the forefoot than meets the eye
cons: The tongue of the Adidas AlphaBounce AMS being sewn on both sides made users feel a little tight at the top of the foot
A couple of users remarked that the AlphaBounce AMS was not efficient for long-distance running
Testers observed that it took some effort to insert their feet into the shoe because the opening was too narrow

customer_reviews.title: Look like pictures.
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and feel supportive, even though I could honestly use more arch support. They look just like the pictures, but they make my feet look a little bit bigger than other gym shoes. I don’t love them, but they’re comfortable & i like that they slip on. They will do— especially since my old trainers were beyond needing replacement.
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: Buy them now!
customer_reviews.text: I am a man, But these were half the price of mens, so I got them. These are excellent shoes. I usually wear a mens 9.5. I got WMNS 10.5 because the reviews said they run a little large. This is true. I could probably have gotten away with a WMNS 10. They fit well enough as they are for me. Super comfortable, and very cool looking. If you're thinking about getting them, just get them.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Definitely 1 size down
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Definitely 1 size down. I get them in 5.5 instead of my usual 6.5. This is my third pair in a different color. I think these black are my favourite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feet hold up all day
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this exact shoe. I love it. So comfortable. I wear them to work 8 hour shifts 40 hours a week on my feet and my feet hold up all day. They never hurt. I would size down a half size as they run big.
customer_reviews.author: Salliewanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Huge shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was huge!!! I think it was a mens shoe but said womens. Box was mens shoe box.The box was destroyed when it arrived. Had to send it back. Hope it makes it back in one piece!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Lynn Heatley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were going to be all black. Turns out it's a patterned grey.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Fit large, buy smaller. Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I bought a size 6 and I normally wear women size 8. Fir great, very comfy! Cute styles.
customer_reviews.author: JeffK

customer_reviews.title: Work fit
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy fit is not tight on my wide foot use for work dont get tired feet they feel like a good grip
customer_reviews.author: Jennie L.

customer_reviews.title: I bought these shoes, because I already own the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes, because I already own the white bounce. I was expecting the same comfort. Did not meet my spectations. It's even hard to put them on every time. And they are at least one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Crina1231

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sneaker - but returned
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 7.5 in sneakers. Unfortunately, this Adidas style ran large so I had to return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they seemed ok, a bit too thick, def not for running.
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and light weight. I get a lot of compliments on these.
customer_reviews.author: FitzFamily2010

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought half size smaller as suggested by reviews, not my fit. To tight for me.
customer_reviews.author: rxk

customer_reviews.title: Still too big after ordering a half size down.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the reviews to order a half size smaller because I'm normally a size 6. The 5.5 were still too big even with thicker socks. Hopefully, a whole size down will do the trick. Overall, the look and feel is great aside from the sizing issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sam T.

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are super comfy and wonderful to work out in
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are super comfy and wonderful to work out in. Adidad do run a half size bigger than a Nike sneaker. Not sure if I bought the half size smaller show if my foot since it's so wide. But it doesn't matter the comfiness of the shoe outweighs it all! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mara Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Love these Sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Best sneakers ever!!!! I just had to get a snaller size! They run big!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise G

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I still give it a five star. My granddaughters foot will surely grow another 1/2 size 😉
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Shipped MEN size instead of Women size !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very DISAPPOINTED!!!! I placed the order for one pair size 9-women and when I open the box I received 8-MEN size.
customer_reviews.author: Neysha D Medina

customer_reviews.title: challenge to wear them
customer_reviews.text: they can not be open you you have to force your feet in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Very comfortable and the perfect alternative to the adidas ultra boost.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker run big
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker fun big i wear sizes 8 but had to get a 7 but the sneaker are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Tameka Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit but don’t like how it looks on my foot. I’m sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughters favorite
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them. Says they are very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Heath O.

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes if I can get the right size ...
customer_reviews.text: They came in men's size so I had to exchange for 2 sizes smaller.. my package was sent back priority 3 days ago and I have left a message inquiring the status of my exchange. Waiting to hear back. I love the shoes if I can get the right size and ASAP, since I need them for a vacation that requires a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not fit like my "Brooks or NuBalance
customer_reviews.text: The 8 1/2 is too large. It does not fit like my "Brooks or NuBalance."
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta A. Whitty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes! Very comfortable and the size is perfectly fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 7..Received a 7 1/2.Very upset.Planned on wearing these on a hiking trip this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as Cute in Person, Runs Big
customer_reviews.text: The Adidas running shoes were a little disappointing upon arrival. They look similar to how they look online but they aren’t as cute in person. Also, they run large. They have a narrow, long fit. I’m guessing they run half a size to a full size too large. Besides the look and appearance, the construction and quality seems to okay.
customer_reviews.author: ⛵⚓Seas the Day⚓⛵

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: These are quite comfortable and I am pretty picky with sneakers. They just feel a bit bigger than my usual in this size and the overall shoe is longer than what I am used to. It's not a deal breaker, but be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. She runs track for her middle school so she is always in need of a good pair of running shoes.These are very well made and fit her perfectly. They give great arch support and don't rub her heel wrong. They will last her through the upcoming track season and beyond!
customer_reviews.author: Loves those books

customer_reviews.title: A bit large but nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 to 8 in a running shoe, I ordered these in an 8 but should have gotten the 7 or 7.5 instead. But that said, with thick socks these are still very comfortable. These have a nice grip and are very airy. I have a narrow foot, and this shoe has a nice fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I will agree with other reviewers that this particular style runs large. I'm a solid size seven, ordered these in a 6.5 due to reviews and sure enough, they fit (with a bit of room to spare). The style is sleek. Super lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Biz

customer_reviews.title: Slip-ons won't work with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my wife in her usual size, as she needed new athletic shoes and I've been wearingfor years. Unfortunately, the slip-on design of the shoe does not work for people with wide feet... she can barely get them on. Additionally, the styling looked better on the screen than in person - sadly, off to the mall we go!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but narrow
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sneakers but a bit narrow and tight. Would have to break them in before I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V. Galasso

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Alphabounce AMS Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Put a little bounce into your next run with the adidas AlphaBounce Ams Running Shoes..
feature_bullets: BOUNCE provides energized comfort for all sports, all day
Engineered mesh upper gives maximum breathability
Sock-like construction for a snug fit
Tongue and heel pulls help simplify entry; Textile lining for comfort
ADIWEAR outsole offers the ultimate in high-wear durability
